extraElement.name: Extra Element
extraElement.description: Allows the user to access one extra element than their tier would allow.

secondExtraElement.name: Second Extra Element
secondExtraElement.description: Allows the user to access another extra element than their tier would allow.

hybridElement.name: Hybrid Element
hybridElement.description: A basic combination of two elements, e.g. Ice Release, Scorch Release.

dojutsu.name: Dojutsu
dojutsu.description: A sophisticated bloodline that allows one to access jutsu via the eyes, e.g. Byakugan, Sharingan.

kekkeiTota.name: Kekkei Tota
kekkeiTota.description: A rare example of a particularly powerful elemental release, e.g. Brine Release, Diamond Release.

imperfectSageMode.name: Imperfect Sage Mode
imperfectSageMode.description: Allows the user to access sage chakra and use special techniques, with the help of their summon. [Minimum Tier: 1-5]

sageMode.name: Sage Mode
sageMode.description: Allows the user to access sage chakra and use special techniques. [Minimum Tier: 1-1]

mangekyouSharingan.name: Mangekyou Sharingan
mangekyouSharingan.description: Allows the user to access the Mangekyou Sharingan and use special techniques unique to them.

puppetry.name: Puppetry
puppetry.description: Allows the user to create chakra strings and control puppets.

humanPuppets.name: Human Puppets
humanPuppets.description: Allows the user to create puppets out of the corpses of others, preserving their techniques.

kekkeiGenkai.name: Kekkei Genkai
kekkeiGenkai.description: For Clan users who are not using Hybrid or Dojutsu techniques that are still tied to their bloodline.

secretJutsu.name: Secret Jutsu
secretJutsu.description: Allows the user to access the secret jutsu of a clan.

secondSecretJutsu.name: Second Secret Jutsu
secondSecretJutsu.description: Allows the user to access the secret jutsu of a second clan.

tailedBeast.name: Tailed Beast
tailedBeast.description: The user has a tailed beast sealed with them (subject to staff approval)

tailedBeastRapport.name: Tailed Beast Rapport
tailedBeastRapport.description: The user has a full relationship with their tailed beast, and can access greater techniques and transformations.

eightGatesUpToThird.name: Eight Gates: Up to Third
eightGatesUpToThird.description: Enables the user to open up to the third gate.

eightGatesUpToFifth.name: Eight Gates: Up to Fifth
eightGatesUpToFifth.description: Enables the user to open up to the fifth gate.

eightGatesUpToEighth.name: Eight Gates: Up to Eighth
eightGatesUpToEighth.description: Enables the user to open up to the eighth gate.

curseMark.name: Curse Mark
curseMark.description: Allows the user to access Stage 1 of their curse mark. Must be applied by someone else.

perfectCurseMark.name: Perfect Curse Mark
perfectCurseMark.description: The user can access Stage 2 of their curse mark, and can also create new curse marks on others, granting them the Curse Mark perk for free.

curseMarkApplier.name: Curse Mark Applier
curseMarkApplier.description: The user can apply curse marks to themselves or other people, though they still need to purchase the perk to be able to use it's power.
